tasks.task: Build a simple and efficient crop farm.
subtasks: Gather necessary materials (8 water buckets, 3 blocks, 2 stacks of dirt, glass, hoppers, redstone, repeater, button, dispensers, chests, and crops).
Position the double chest and connect the hopper to it.
Lay out the dirt fields (two 8x8 and an 8x7 field).
Create a water trough around the farm.
Build walls to contain the water and protect the field.
Pour water into designated buckets in the trough.
Cover water buckets and trough with blocks.
Place dispensers along the top of the walls.
Insert water buckets into dispensers.
Arrange redstone path with a button and repeater.
Add glass walls for aesthetic improvement.
Demolish a block to connect two hoppers (if using two hoppers).
Till the land and plant crops.
Activate the button to start the automatic crop farm.
Collect harvested crops from the chests.

tasks.task: Create a detailed guide video for building an automatic crop farm.
subtasks: Introduce the materials needed and disassemble each part.
Explain the step-by-step construction process of the farm.
Demonstrate the function of the system with activation and replanting.
Encourage viewer engagement through feedback collection.
